title: Regulating dielectricity of polymer electrolyte to promote cation mobility for high-performance solid zinc hybrid batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01366B, Paper
Yue Hou, Zhiquan Wei, Zhuoxi Wu, Yiqiao Wang, Zhaodong Huang, Qing Li, Ze Chen, Xinliang Li, Pei Li, Huilin Cui, Guojin Liang, Chunyi Zhi
Solid polymer electrolytes (SPEs) offer advantages in suppressing uncontrollable dendrite formation and the hydrogen evolution reaction (HER) at the Zn metal anode of Zn-based batteries, providing good electrochemical stability and...
